import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Blogcard.css"; import blog from "../assets/data/blogs" const BlogCard = ({ }) => { const { _id, title, author, date, photo, comments } = blog; return (
{author} {date}
{title}
{comments.length} Comments
); }; export default BlogCard;
